Tensorflow layers

{% raw %}

class MaskSequence[source]

MaskSequence(*args, **kwargs) :: Layer

Base class to prepare masked items inputs/ labels for language modeling tasks.

Transformer architectures can be trained in different ways. Depending on the training method, there is a specifc msaking schema. The masking schema sets the items to be predicted (labels) and mask (hide) their positions in the sequence so that they are not used by the Transformer layers for prediction

We currently provide 4 different masking schemes out of the box:

  • Causal LM (clm)
  • Masked LM (mlm)
  • Permutation LM (plm)
  • Replacement TOken (rtd)

This class can be extended to add different a masking scheme.

Parameters
